valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 1 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 2 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Scotland 981 expected northeast of Iceland 977 by 0600 tomorrow. Low south of Iceland 962 expected Bailey 976 by same time
